channel.title: Error connecting to server?
channel.description:
Hey everyone i released a new base about a couple of weeks ago
and we have managed to get a couple of players online but many others have a error connecting to server
its 24-7 vps i have setup the no-ip and its online and fully working for a couple of users and myself
what do you suggest could be the problem?

item.title: Error connecting to server?
item.dc:creator: @boi_jx boi_jx
item.description:
@boi_jx wrote:

u making sure that the cache is properly beeing opened and make sure u ziped ur cache correctly for people to download it also make sure ur firewall isnt blocking them from connectiong to u?

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server?
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Check to see if this error is fixed when the person suffering from this issue closes/re-opens the client.

Read full topic
